title: 3dAFNItoANALYZE
description: Writes AFNI dataset to ANALYZE 7.5 format .hdr/.img file pairs.

4d_option.title: 4D flag
4d_option.description: Write all data to one big ANALYZE file pair named aname.hdr/aname.img

orient_option.title: Orientation code
orient_option.description: Flip the dataset to a different orientation when writing to ANALYZE files (e.g., LPI)

output_name.title: Output name
output_name.description: Output ANALYZE file base name (e.g., aname)
